description:
Dauntless is a cooperative action RPG where you team up with other hunters to take down giant beasts known as Behemoths. As a newcomer to the city of Ramsgate, you'll start by crafting basic gear and weapons.

But don't let the vibrant cartoon graphics fool you - these Behemoths are serious threats. There are all kinds roaming the nearby Islands like the fire-breathing Embermane or the lightning-fast Stormclaw. Before facing off against each one, you'll need to prepare by studying their attack patterns and weaknesses.

Alone you may not survive, but together you'll form hunting parties of up to four slayers. Then it's time to embark on quests and engage in jumbo-sized brawls against these massive monsters. Choose from different weapon types like swords, axes or warpikes to deal damage.

As you defeat Behemoths and complete quests, you'll earn rewards to craft more powerful armor and armaments. Unlock new weapons with unique special skills to match your playstyle. Rise through the ranks, take on increasingly toughdirect challenges, and always stay on your toes - one misstep could spell disaster against these colossal creatures!

Dauntless makes hunting huge beasts both cooperatively and competitively fun. Will you be the greatest slayer the Islands have ever seen?
name: Dauntless
